commitResults.messageBody:
Changes to be committed:
	modified:   src/main/java/Duke.java

UserInterface handles user input from stdin and executes commands.
Entering "bye" exits the program.
Entering anything else echoes that command to stdout.
Added basic documentation.

commitResults.messageTitle: Level 1: Implement add and list functions
commitResults.messageBody:
Implemented addTask(String), which adds a task inputted by the user to
an ArrayList. This is now the default behaviour of the bot, if the
command inputted does not match any other commands.
Implemented printTasks(), which prints all stored tasks to stdout.
echo() still exists, but is obsolete and unused.

commitResults.messageTitle: Level 3: Add mark and unmark functions
commitResults.messageBody:
Implemented the Task class to represent tasks and modified UserInterface
to make use of it.

Simplified documentation for several functions.

Renamed startup() to greeting() to avoid confusion with start().

Added null checks and try-catch blocks to functions with parameters.

Removed the obsolete echo() function.
Modified code to fit coding standard.

commitResults.messageTitle: A-CodingStandard: Modify code to fit coding standard
commitResults.messageBody:
Renamed exit() to printGoodbye() to avoid confusion, as
printGoodbye() does not actually exit the program.

Simplified documentation.

Renamed startup() to printGreeting() to avoid confusion with start().

Switch indentation has been changed to follow Coding Standard. Switch
and case statements now have the same indentation.

commitResults.messageTitle: A-CodeQuality: Refactor code to improve quality
commitResults.messageBody:
Removed redundant documentation.

Changed String "mode" to "taskType" for clarity.

commitResults.messageTitle: A-CodeQuality: Refactor code to improve quality
commitResults.messageBody:
Removed redundant documentation.

Changed String "mode" to "taskType" for clarity.

commitResults.messageTitle: Level-4: Add support for ToDo, Event, Deadline
commitResults.messageBody:
Added the above subclasses of Task.

Only ToDo, Event and Deadline objects may now be created and added to
the list of tasks.

The preposition entered by the user (e.g. "/by") is now taken into
account when printing the Task. Prepositions are no longer hardcoded
into the subclasses' toString methods.

Partial support for multiple prepositions implemented
(e.g. deadline return book /by June 6th /to Library).
The class constructors still only accept one preposition, so this does
nothing.
Added .txt files to semi-automate testing using shell scripts.

commitResults.messageTitle: A-CodeQuality: Rename methods and remove ascii
commitResults.messageBody:
Renamed methods to become verbs rather than nouns.

Removed the ascii because it was ugly.

commitResults.messageTitle: A-CodeQuality: Replace magic strings with variables
commitResults.messageBody:
Replaced command strings such as "bye", "todo" etc with static variables
for easier maintenance if the strings need to be modified.

executeCommand(String) no longer checks for null input as the try catch
block makes this redundant.

The default block now prints to stdout instead of throwing an exception
to allow the user to input a new command instead of getting stuck in the
function.

buildTask was still named taskBuilder in the documentation for another
method, so it has been renamed.
Improved SLAP and rewrote toString methods to use String.format().

commitResults.messageTitle: Implement error handling for all commands
commitResults.messageBody:
Incorrect user input for any command will now print an informative error
message rather than a generic one.

This message gives the user instructions on how to fix their input.

Save would not function when there was no save file already existing.
This commit fixes that by creating an empty save file if one does not
already exist.

commitResults.messageTitle: Fix save function to create directories if needed
commitResults.messageBody:
The save function would fail if the data directory was not already present.
This commit fixes that. The savefile can now be created if the data
directory is missing (the data directory will be created) and if the
data directory is present but the savefile is missing.

Events were being saved as Deadlines. This has been fixed. All three
types of tasks save correctly now.

commitResults.messageTitle: Refactor: Create Storage, TaskList, Ui classes
Refactor methods into Storage, TaskList, Ui
commitResults.messageBody:
Methods related to saving and loading from the save file have been
refactored into Storage.

Methods related to managing Tasks have been refactored into TaskList.

Methods related to displaying the user interface have been refactored
into Ui.

Refactored code into the Parser and Command classes.
Subclasses of Command exist for each type of Command.
Parser parses user input into a Command.

commitResults.messageTitle: Fix deadline and event format bug
Fix event and deadline loading bug

commitResults.messageBody:
YYYY-MM-DD dates will now be formatted in a readable format. Times are
not supported.
Branch level 8
Add find command
Add preliminary documentation to FindCommand

commitResults.messageTitle: Add JavaDoc to classes and methods
Add JavaDoc to classes and methods
Add JavaDoc to classes and methods

commitResults.messageBody: Add README
Creating a ToDo with a blank description now prints an error.
